data.name: aaa_base
data.value: CREATE TABLE `aaa_base` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla Base : Id = 20190613_2133_1020' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ;

data.name: app_setting
data.value: CREATE TABLE `app_setting` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Config` LONGTEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla Base : Id = 20190613_2133_1020' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: app_setting_data
data.value: REPLACE INTO `app_setting` (`Id`, `AppId`, `AppVersion`, `PcHost`, `UsuarioCreo`, `Config`, `FechaCreo`, `FechaElimino`, `UsuarioElimino`, `Activo`, `Token`) VALUES ('20200213_014602_0646', '@AppId', '@AppVersion', '@PcHost', '@Usuario', '', NOW(), NULL, NULL, b'1', 'Gk736b9mFopq/Gafcm8g2Ko+DZAqkH7zuuOkjffv2NJ+QZWXO1jrbnob08GVFeTzaEYlmb7pF+q0NNp8t74Wgk8Xs5a2HXQDMQ2WyEsyeYe6K9mbDTqSUithQHHFO4ts');

data.name: bitacora_sistema
data.value: CREATE TABLE `bitacora_sistema` ( `Id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Titulo` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Observacion` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `EsError` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla de Bitacora de Cambios /Errores del Sistema' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC AUTO_INCREMENT=9644 ;

data.name: crear_bdd
data.value: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `@bdd`; USE `@bdd`;

data.name: formatos_rpt
data.value: CREATE TABLE `formatos_rpt` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Nombre` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Codigo` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Formato` LONGBLOB NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Impresora` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla Base : Id = 20190613_2133_1020\r\nAlmacena virtualmente los formatos de reportes o impresiones' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: perfil_hotspot
data.value: CREATE TABLE `perfil_hotspot` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `IdServer` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Descripcion` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Kb_Descarga` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Kb_Subida` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Minutos` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `HP_Id` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla Base : Id = 20190613_2133_1020 Bitacora de Perfiles creados en el hotSpot' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: perfil_sistema
data.value: CREATE TABLE `perfil_sistema` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Nombre` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FormulariosAcceso` LONGTEXT NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8mb4_bin', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla Base : Id = 20190613_2133_1020 Perfiles de Sistemas' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: perfil_sistema_data
routeros_usage_stats
data.value: CREATE TABLE `routeros_usage_stats` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `ServerId` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `json_data` LONGTEXT NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8mb4_bin', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla Base : Id = 20190613_2133_1020' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: server
data.value: CREATE TABLE `server` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Descripcion` VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `IP` VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Puerto` SMALLINT(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Usuario` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Clave` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Predeterminado` CHAR(1) NULL DEFAULT 'N' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `OsVersion` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT '6.43' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla para guardar de un router: Id = 20190613_2133_1020' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: sys_config
data.value: CREATE TABLE `sys_config` ( `config` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `value` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `value_bin` LONGBLOB NULL DEFAULT NULL, `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT b'1' ) COMMENT='Configuraciones del programa' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: sys_config_data
usuario_hotspot
data.value: CREATE TABLE `usuario_hotspot` ( `Id` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `IdServer` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `IdPerfil` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Usuario` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Clave` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Tiempo` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Tiempo de Vigencia', `TipoTiempo` CHAR(2) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Comentario` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `HP_Perfil` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `HP_Id` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT='Tabla de usuarios para bitacora del hotspot' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: usuario_sistema
data.value: CREATE TABLE `usuario_sistema` ( `Id` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Nombre` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Apellido` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Usuario` VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Clave` VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `IdPerfil` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppId` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `AppVersion` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `PcHost` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `UsuarioCreo` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `FechaCreo` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `FechaElimino` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `UsuarioElimino` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Token` VARCHAR(300) NULL DEFAULT '1' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci', `Activo` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT b'1', PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE INDEX `Usuario` (`Usuario`, `Activo`) USING BTREE, INDEX `FK_Perfil` (`IdPerfil`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `FK_Perfil` FOREIGN KEY (`IdPerfil`) REFERENCES `mk_admin`.`perfil_sistema` (`Id`) ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT ) COMMENT='Usuarios del sistema : mVHy12nTdRpwD45wcP7F7oUJs9RBvs+srMw466Ui3wHQ=k' COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC ;

data.name: usuario_sistema_data
data.value: REPLACE INTO `usuario_sistema` (`Id`, `Nombre`, `Apellido`, `Usuario`, `Clave`, `IdPerfil`, `AppId`, `AppVersion`, `PcHost`, `UsuarioCreo`, `FechaCreo`, `FechaElimino`, `UsuarioElimino`, `Token`, `Activo`) VALUES ('0', 'Administrador', 'de Sistema', 'ADMIN', 'VHy12nTdRpwD45wcP7F7oUJs9RBvs+srMw466Ui3wHQ=', '20190626_224822_0747', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '1', b'1');
